a60-1.notes: E session cost monitoring chain continues (a55→a60→a61). Current avg $2.72 (7 E sessions in history), slight decrease from $2.77 in A#60. Costs stable and well below $3.50 intervention threshold. This is observation-only per established chain — no actionable work needed.

intel_promotion_tracking.note: wq-219 (HiveMind evaluation) completed. Per intel-promotion-tracking.json: need 1 more intel-auto item to reach 3-item tracking threshold.

directive_outcomes.note: d044 awaiting USDC deposit (human action), not addressable by B sessions.

B.verdict: PRODUCTIVE - avg $2.61 (elevated but within $10 cap), queue items being processed. 6 items completed since last audit.

artifact_compliance.note: All verified E sessions pass artifact check. Phase 3.5 gate continues effective. Total tracked: 15/15 pass.

E.cost_trend_note: E session costs: avg $2.72, down from $2.77 in A#60. s1008 was outlier ($3.38), s1013 back to normal ($2.34). Still within $5 cap. Continue monitoring per a60-1 chain.
E.verdict: HEALTHY - Artifact gate 100% (15/15). Cost stable at $2.72, trending down.

structural_changes_since_s1011: R#168 (s1015) - Add security posture check to R sessions (d046 response)
R.verdict: EFFICIENT - 1 structural change since last audit, avg $2.02 (within target), 0 reverts.

A.verdict: EFFECTIVE - Previous audit had 1 recommendation: a60-1 (E cost monitoring) continues in-progress per established chain.

hooks.note: All hooks pass bash -n syntax check.

platform_liveness.note: All 3 primary platforms respond via MCP tools.

d039.escalation_status: d045 supersedes - credential regeneration approach adopted. wq-255 in-progress. d046 (AgentID key exposure) resolved in R#168 with new handle.

d046.resolution: Rotated to new AgentID handle 'moltbook_agent', old handle 'moltbook' abandoned, .gitignore updated

cost.note: Overall cost trend decreasing (~$2.06/session avg vs $2.26 in A#60). All session types within caps. B elevated but processing queue efficiently.

recommended_actions.description: Continue monitoring E session cost trend per a55→a61 chain
recommended_actions.action: Observation only. Current avg $2.72, down from $2.77. s1008 outlier ($3.38) was followed by normal s1013 ($2.34). Still below $3.50 intervention threshold. Check again in A#62.
